INVALID_COMMAND_TEXT: I am sorry, I did not understand that statement. Please use 'alfred help' to learn about my features
INVALID_ORDER_TEXT: is not a valid Little Delhi item. Use: 'alfred list' to see the list of valid items
NO_SPICE_OPTION_TEXT: does not have a spice option
NO_INFO_TEXT: you have not registered your name and number yet. Use: alfred info "<FIRST> <LAST>, ##########", to set your name and number
NO_FAVORITE_TEXT: you have not set a favorite yet. Use: alfred favorite "<order1>, <order2>, ..."
NO_ORDER_TEXT: you have not placed an order today.
INVALID_INFO_TEXT: is invalid. Your command must be formatted as such: alfred info "<FIRST> <LAST>, ##########"
ORDER_ALREADY_PLACED_TEXT: the order has already been placed today, your order has not been submitted
NO_MENU_ITEMS: There were no menu items detected in the message
